Description: Measured angle of the stream bank;
Percent of 42 banks lacking visible signs of active erosion (e.g., slump, slough, fracture) (units: %, min: 0, max: 100, n= 42)
Average bankfull height measured from water surface across transects.
Average bankfull width across transects for the reach.
Beaver value from the provider dataset.

LongName: Diameter of the 16th percentile streambed particle
Description: Bed surface particle size corresponding to the 16th percentile of measured particles

LongName: Diameter of the 50th percentile streambed particle
Description: Median diameter of bed surface particle size corresponding to the areal median (50th percentile of measured particles) .

LongName: Diameter of the 84th percentile streambed particle
Description: Bed surface particle size corresponding to the 84th percentile of measured particles
Measure of the concentration of ionized materials in water, or the ability of water to conduct electrical current. Used as a measure of mineral / ionic concentration.

LongName: Bankfull width to depth ratio at transects
Description: Average bankfull width/depth ratio for the reach.
Number of transects in the reach.
Number of cross sections included in the average bankfull width calculation
Percent of the stream bed area that is composed of particles with a b-axis > 4098mm (bedrock)

LongName: Percent of Reach that is Dry
Description: Percent of the reach that was dry
Percent of the stream bed area that is comprised of particles with a b-axis < 2 mm
Percent of the stream bed area that is composed of particles with a b-axis < 6 mm
Percent of the sample reach (linear extent) classified as pool habitat
Measured pH value
Average percent fine sediment (< 2mm) on the pool tail
Average percent fine sediment (< 6mm) on the pool tail
Average of the residual pool depth values for all pools in a reach. Residual pool depth the difference of the pool tail depth from the max depth.
Mean slope of water surface (%) from the bottom of the reach to the top of the reach.
Reach sinuosity (reach length along the thalweg divided by straight line distance between the bottom of the reach and the top of the reach)
Measured specific conductance value. The specific conductance is conductivity standardized to 25 degrees C.
Strahler stream order of the site from the provider dataset
Mean thalweg depth. Metric of how deep water was at the site.
Length of sampling reach measured along the thalweg
Measured total nitrogen value
Measured total phosphorous value
Average water clarity as measured by the suspended solids in the water column
Average wetted width across transects.
